text: Amy Earnhardt celebrated her first Mother's Day on Sunday, just shy of two weeks after giving birth to Isla Rose, her and Dale Earnhardt Jr.'s first child. Isla was born on April 30, and Dale recently shared the actual birth story and how they decided on her name, as well as a dozen things he's since learned about his newborn daughter. And for the perfect Mother's Day posts, the new parents each shared the first photos of Isla with the internet on their Instagram accounts. She is adorable - although these photos might be all the internet gets for a while, as Dale Jr. recently hinted on his podcast that they might not be posting a lot. Everyone was right.
